menu.title: Greek Salad
menu.description: Indulge in the famous Greek salad featuring crispy lettuce, vibrant peppers, briny olives, and our signature Chicago dressing. A refreshing starter that tantalizes your taste buds.

menu.title: Lemon Dessert
menu.description: Savor the exquisite flavors of our traditional homemade Italian Lemon Ricotta Cake. A delightful dessert that combines the zesty essence of lemons with the richness of creamy ricotta.

menu.title: Grilled Fish
menu.description: Experience culinary bliss with our Grilled Fish Bruschetta. Delight in grilled bread adorned with garlic, seasoned with salt, and drizzled with olive oil, creating a Mediterranean masterpiece.

menu.title: Pasta
menu.description: Treat yourself to the irresistible Penne with fried aubergines, cherry tomatoes, tomato sauce, fresh chilli, garlic, basil, and salted ricotta cheese. A symphony of flavors in every bite.

menu.title: Bruschetta
menu.description: Elevate your senses with our oven-baked bruschetta stuffed with succulent tomatoes and aromatic herbs. A perfect starter to ignite your appetite and set the tone for a delightful meal.

menu.title: Miso Soup
menu.description: Immerse yourself in the traditions of Japan with our Miso Soup. Crafted from fermented soybean paste, this soup delivers a harmonious blend of flavors, bringing warmth to your palate.

menu.title: Tiramisu
menu.description: Experience the timeless allure of our Tiramisu. Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and velvety mascarpone cream create a symphony of textures and tastes in this classic Italian dessert.

menu.title: Grilled Steak
menu.description: Savor the succulence of our Grilled Steak, expertly seasoned with a special blend of herbs and spices. Each juicy bite is a testament to the craftsmanship that goes into every dish.

menu.title: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Delight in the simplicity of our Margherita Pizza, topped with fresh tomatoes, gooey mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves. A classic that captures the essence of Italian culinary artistry.

menu.title: Garlic Bread
menu.description: Satisfy your cravings with our oven-baked Garlic Bread, generously topped with garlic butter and aromatic herbs. A perfect accompaniment to start your culinary journey.

menu.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Indulge in decadence with our Chocolate Lava Cake, a heavenly creation with a gooey molten center. Each spoonful is a journey into the rich and velvety world of chocolate delights.

menu.title: Chicken Parmesan
menu.description: Experience the perfection of our Chicken Parmesan, featuring a breaded and fried chicken cutlet topped with flavorful tomato sauce and melted cheese. A comforting main course that satisfies every palate.

menu.title: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Refresh your senses with our Caprese Salad, a vibrant medley of fresh mozzarella, juicy tomatoes, and aromatic basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze. An exquisite starter that celebrates simplicity.

menu.title: Cheesecake
menu.description: Delight in the creamy indulgence of our New York-style Cheesecake. With a luscious texture and a graham cracker crust, each bite is a journey into the world of irresistible sweetness.

menu.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Experience the classic flavors of Italy with our Spaghetti Carbonara. This pasta dish, featuring eggs, pancetta, and grated cheese, is a culinary masterpiece that transports you to the heart of Italian cuisine.
